entries.name: irb_load(fn, priv = nil)
entries.desc: Loads the given file similarly to Kernel#load

entries.name: load_file(path, priv = nil)
entries.desc: Loads the given file in the current session's context and evaluates it.

entries.name: source_file(path)
entries.desc: Loads a given file in the current session and displays the source lines
